MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in Balgair Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.49pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at Kingsburgh Drive and are investigating an underground cable fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.15pm on Friday 16th October 2020.
